label: AccountingAccount
comment: A specific account for recording debits and credits to general accounting, cost accounting or budget accounting.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a set trigger for this trade accounting account to be used in response to a specific event or a set of events.
The code specifying the amount type for this trade accounting account.
The cost reference dimension pattern, expressed as text, for this trade accounting account.
The unique identifier for this trade accounting account.
The name, expressed as text, of this trade accounting account.
The code specifying the type of trade accounting account, such as general (main), secondary, cost accounting or budget account.

referencedBy.comment: The buyer deductible tax specified accounting account for this trade related tax, levy or duty.
The buyer non-deductible tax specified accounting account for this trade related tax, levy or duty.
The buyer repayable tax specified accounting account for this trade related tax, levy or duty.
The seller payable tax specified accounting account for this trade related tax, levy or duty.
The seller refundable tax specified accounting account for this trade related tax, levy or duty.
A specified accounting account for this trade related tax, levy or duty.
